name: Love in the Commune
description:
LOVE IN THE COMMUNE

In 1871, during 72 days, the working class, the refugees and the poor of Paris resisted the government and started to build their own and fairer society: La Commune.

But it would all end during the Bloody Week.

Follow Alice as she tries to escape from Paris alive with her lover, witnessing the end of her dreams as her city burns.

This interactive fiction was inspired by the canceled work made by a team of 9 for the Rainbow Jam 2019 and uses the constraints established back then. For the best experience, I recommend playing in full screen. It takes ~20min to complete.
Thanks to (listing only those who agreed to be mentionned):

  • Amélia Chavot
  • Carowouine
  • Quinten
  • Sacha Holsnyder https://soundcloud.com/sacha-holsnyder / https://cawawac.itch.io/
  • Today
  • Léo Lefebvre - @troleoleo / https://troleoleo.itch.io/

Story outline by Quinten & Gabin Jirodet

Written and designed by Gabin Jirodet

Additional CSS by Charlotte Adamowicz

If you liked this interactive fiction, please consider making a small donation.

\\WARNING//
This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
